participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and motivational, always encouraging others to push through their limits.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i'm a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Resilient and inspiring, constantly finding ways to uplift those around her despite challenges.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons.
